description: This file defines a React functional component named Header that renders a top navigation bar with a hamburger menu. The component manages menu visibility state, handles outside click and escape key events to close the menu, and includes navigation functionality to the '/schedule' route.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: React functional component rendering a header with a menu and navigation features.

methods.name: goSchedule
methods.description: Function to close the menu and navigate to the /schedule route.
